api.title: UIBlurEffect
api.description: An object that applies a blurring effect to the content layered behind a visual effect view.

overview.description: Views that you add to the contentView of a visual effect view are not affected by the blur effect.

method.name: init(style: UIBlurEffect.Style)
method.description: Creates a blur effect with the designated style.

method.name: enum UIBlurEffect.Style
method.description: Blur styles available for UIBlurEffect objects.

control.name: class UIVisualEffect
control.description: An initializer for visual effect views and blur and vibrancy effect objects.

control.name: class UIVisualEffectView
control.description: An object that implements some complex visual effects.

control.name: class UIVibrancyEffect
control.description: An object that amplifies and adjusts the color of the content layered behind a visual effect view.
